summary: Jack goes up the beanstalk to rescue a little girl who has been transformed into a harp.
cast: Colin Ford|Chloë Grace Moretz|Christopher Lloyd|Adair Tishler|William Brent|Emily Rose Everhard|Sadie Eve|Victoria Atilano|Atalaya Atilano|Anthony Skillman|Sammi Hanratty|Daniel Roebuck|Wallace Shawn|Katey Sagal|Gilbert Gottfried|James Karen|Madison Davenport|David Mattey|James Earl Jones|Jeff L. Deist|Gary J. Tunnicliffe|Frank Payne|Kevin Schon|Hal B. Klein|Chevy Chase|Alan Gray|Brian Peck
title: Jack y las judías mágicas
